# Problem 1

## Creating a data frame

```{r}
 samp = rnorm(10)
length(samp)
```

## Creating logical vector

Problem1_df = tibble(
  runif(10, min=0, max=5) 
  vec_numeric = c(samp>2)
  vec_char = c("My", "name", "is", "Jeff"),
  vec_logical = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE),
  vec_factor = factor(c("African descent", "White", "Asian", "Native American"))
)
